title: Bug 123044 - Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen.
description: Description: Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen.
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF, the page break in the first item did not occur.
EB: Expected behavior: When previewing in PDF, the first page should be blank because the first item has its 'pagebreakbefore' property set to 'always'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the attached file. 
2. Preview the file in PDF format.
